story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Habb.ch was founded in Switzerland with the vision of combining traditional Swiss values such as precision, reliability, and quality with modern technological innovation.
story.p2: As brothers with strong academic backgrounds in Computer Science and Business Information Systems, we bring together deep technical expertise and a solid understanding of business processes. Our shared mission is to support Swiss companies in adopting AI automation, digital transformation, and intelligent IT solutions in a practical and sustainable way.
story.p3: We believe that technology should empower businesses and not complicate them. That is why our team works relentlessly to deliver solutions that are not only technically excellent, but also efficient, user-friendly, and tailored to real-world business needs.
story.p4: Today, we serve clients across industries, helping them navigate the digital landscape with confidence and success.
